# River Paws Dog Grooming & Hiking

## About

River Paws is a professional dog grooming salon and adventure hiking service located in Waunakee, Wisconsin, serving the greater Madison area including Middleton, DeForest, Sun Prairie, and surrounding communities.

## Summary

We provide full-service professional dog grooming and small-group adventure hikes for dogs. Our experienced groomers offer breed-specific cuts, baths, nail trims, and complete grooming services. Our adventure hikes take dogs on guided outdoor adventures in natural settings.

## Key Services

- **Professional Dog Grooming**: Full-service grooming with experienced professionals
  - Full body grooming and haircuts
  - Bath and brush packages
  - Ã€ la carte services (nail trims, ear cleaning, teeth brushing)
  - Breed-specific styling
  - Premium pet-safe products

- **Adventure Dog Hikes**: Small-group guided hikes
  - Natural enrichment activities
  - Socialization opportunities
  - Supervised outdoor adventures
  - Small group sizes for personalized attention

- **Puppy Play**: Socialization and play services for puppies

## Location

Waunakee, Wisconsin (on the edge of Waunakee and Madison)
Serving: Madison, Middleton, DeForest, Sun Prairie, and surrounding areas

- Experienced, trained groomers
- Premium pet-safe products
- Stress-free environment
- Transparent pricing
- Convenient location with parking
- Flexible scheduling
